review.comment: Responsive and reliable
Excellent service. Highly recommended

Bought a very beautiful swing from here. The price was very reasonable and quality is great. Strong built swing. The process of purchase and delivery was smooth as well as fast.

I only contacted them through Facebook initially and was slightly worried about quality but the proved me wrong. I will definitely go into their store to check out their other products. Thank you, Crown Furniture & Carpets Team!

review.comment: Beautiful Afghan tribal carpets for the prayer area. The colours are so rich and vibrant, the fur so thick and soft and it they were rather an intresting point of discussion. Tq Mr Norman and Mr Kazi for sharing the historical culture of the country and its people for through the purchase of the carpets we  were enlightened as if we walked through history itself... I really recommend Crownfurniturecarpets for anyone who wants to buy not just carpets but knowledge about it as well...
